page.title: 14Housing
page.content:
{Residential Area. Meadgate, Gt.Baddow Meadgate Estate was built on the land of the old Meadgate Farm.The houses were all built as council houses although some of them are now privately owned.There is one main road through the estate with many cul-de-sacs.
{Meadgate Avenue}is served by a bus service. In Mascalls Way there is a {Primary School}which has its own swimming pool. Meadgate has all the shops that will serve the community's needs. The shops are built in an "L" shape. There are 9 shops and one church. Goods sold and services include: greengrocery,fish and chips, meat, off licence, newsagents, video centre, haberdashers, supermarket and a unisex hairdressers. {
